attributes.action: Allocate appropriate funding to repair the poor state of UK roads or reduce tax
attributes.additional_details: Evidence isn’t required. Simply drive on any road in the UK and this will be evident.
attributes.background: The UK rods are currently in a shocking state of disrepair with thousands of miles of pot holes and broken tarmac. The disrepair is causing substantial car damage and cost to UK tax payers. The road tax increase as does the council tax but yet no attempt is made to repair the roads properly
